Allow sites to access videos on the server via images
Enable Image ON by Enswers Inc.

"The Image ON service matches images on a webpage to videos, using the owners' URLs and IP addresses, and plays the videos in their original online locations when browsing. This service is provided by Enswers Inc. Use Image ON?"

"Enswers, Inc. respects the data privacy of the individuals that use our services. The practices of Enswers, Inc. with respect to data collected and used in connection with our services are governed by this Privacy Policy, based on the Korean \ufffdAct on Information and Communications Network Utilization and Information Protection This Privacy Policy is effective as of 06 06, 2013.
1. Collection of Personal Information a) What personal information we collect i)We may automatically collect personal information when you use our services. The electronically collected personal information includes: services or web pages you accessed (URL), illegal usage of our service, and your Internet Protocol (IP) address. ii)We may collect anonymized web page URLs you visit and the information of the videos you watch or share in order to provide good-quality service and improve those services.
b) How we collect personal information - We automatically collect your personal information when you use our services.
2. Purpose and Use of Personal Information We use personal information to track features such as delivering contents specific to your interests and in informing you of new, relevant products or services. We do not disclose any of your information to a third party without your prior consent. We use the collected personal information mainly for the following purposes:
Execution of contract and service provisions Searching for the original version of image Membership Management Management of customer relationships, including customer complaints Service Improvement Development and specialisation of new services (products), via statistics on how often you visit the site and what services you use
3. Retention of personal information Collected personal information is retained in an anonymized form. We will delete your personal information immediately after we fulfil the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, except in the following case Record of illegal use - Reason for extended retention: Prevention of further illegal use - Retention period: 1 year We will retain your personal information for the period necessary to fulfil the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. -Data on contract termination: 5 years (Act on Consumer Protection in Electronic Commerce Transactions) -Data on customer claims and measures: 5years (Act on Consumer Protection in Electronic Commerce Transactions) -Data on service access history: 3 months (Protection of Communications Secrets Act)
4. Deletion of Personal Information We will delete any personal information, without delay, after information has been obtained and used for its primary purpose. Personal information will be destroyed through the following procedure and method:
Deletion Procedure Personal information is deleted immediately after it is used to attain its primary purpose
Deletion Method Personal information is stored in an electronic file format which, once erased, uses technical methods to prevent records from being recovered
5. Provision and Sharing of Personal Information We will use any personal information in accordance with and within the scope of the aforementioned Article 2 \ufffdPurpose and Use of Personal Informationand therefore will neither use personal information outside of the scope nor disclose said personal information to the public without prior consent, with the following exceptions: - permission to disclose such personal information by prior consent; or - legal obligation or by order or requirement of a court, administrative agency or other governmental institution..
6. Technical and Administrative Privacy Measures for Personal Information We enforce the following technical and administrative measures to safeguard your personal information against loss, theft, leakage, misuse, modification or damage while handling information: - Hacking precautions We systematically maintain a f irewall to safeguard your personal information from loss and/or misuse caused by hacking, computer viruses, or other threats. Anti-virus programs are updated periodically to protect personal information from data leakage and/or damage. - Access Restriction and Training We limit access of personal information to employees who have a business reason to access the information, and safeguard such information with passwords that are updated on a regular basis. Also training sessions are conducted for relevant employees to comply with this Privacy Policy.
7. Privacy Support Contacts If you have any questions or complaints regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us using the information below.
Personal Information Controller: Personal Information Security Manager - Name: Park, Dae Bong - Title: Executive Director - Contact: 02-598-5857, support@imideo.com
The Department of Personal Information Security is responsible for protecting personal information and authorising personal information access. - Name/Title: Park, Chu Young, Dept. of Service Operation - Contact: 02-598-5857, support@imideo.com
If you have questions or claims concerning a case of privacy infringement, please contact the organisations below or visit their websites for more information.
- Personal Information Infringement Hotline (www.118.or.kr / 118) - E-privacy Committee (www.eprivacy.or.kr / 02-580-0533~4) - Cybercrime Investigation Center, Supreme Prosecutorsffice (www.spo.go.kr / 02-3480-2000) - Cyber Terror Response Center, National Police Agency (www.ctrc.go.kr / 02-392-0330)
8. Notification of Changes to Privacy Policy We will post any Privacy Policy changes including additions, deletions, or revisions on the Notice section of our homepage no later than seven days before the changes are incorporated into the current Privacy Policy.
This Privacy Policy was last notified on: 06/06, 2013 This Privacy Policy is in effect as of: 06/06, 2013"

Wi-Fi connection required. Connect to Wi-Fi network and try again.
WLAN connection required. Connect to WLAN and try again.
"Tap 'R' button to open reading menu in reader mode supportive content."
"Select 'Read later', then content is saved to reading list."
In Internet, you can extract webpages and translate their content. To start, go to Extract settings and enable Extract view and Translate text.
Extract view supported for this page.
In Internet, you can also view translations of your extracted content. To use this function, enable Translate text and set your target language.
An error occurred while displaying this webpage. To continue, tap Reload or go to another page.
Sync with bookmarks and open pages on your PC browser
WLAN is not available. Connecting to mobile networks may result in additional charges depending on your payment plan.
The device will use data through the currently connected WLAN network.
"Contextual content supports English. Turn on below option to display an overlay button on your conversation view."
Show a button for contextual contents of reader mode pages

Related content automatically suggests info related to extracted contents . You can access this info in Related content under more options, or by tapping the related content button in Extract view. To display the related content button on Extract view, enable the option below. Related content is currently supported in English.
Unable to connect to mobile networks while Flight mode is enabled. Connect to Wi-Fi network instead, or disable Flight mode and try again.
Mobile data is disabled. Connect to Wi-Fi network instead, or enable mobile data and try again.
Data roaming is disabled. Connect to Wi-Fi network instead, or enable data roaming and try again.
No signal found for mobile networks.
Wi-Fi connection required. Connect to Wi-Fi network and try again.
